description: Looking for a lightweight, bulk-free sock to help add some comfort to your ski days? Look no further than the PhD® Ski Light Elite. These men's ski socks equip you with Smartwool's Indestructawool™ technology for enhanced durability, Smartwool's 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a dialed, performance-oriented fit, and Smartwool's Virtually Seamless™ toe for enhanced in-boot comfort. They are designed with a wider welt to help ensure all-day comfort, targeted cushioning around the toe, heel, and shin, and body-mapped mesh zones help keep things breathable. With how technical and comfortable these socks are, you might love them as much as you love a day on the slopes.
name: Smartwool PhD Ski Light Elite Socks - Mens
